amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $335,000,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $335,000,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A013) Failed by voice vote.
